exceptions.tactic: apply Rbar_is_lub_subset with (E1 := fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = u n) (l1 := l1).
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable E2.

original: intros H1 H2 H3. apply Rbar_is_lub_subset with (E1 := fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = u n) (l1 := l1). intros x Hx. destruct Hx as [n Hn]. rewrite Hn. apply H1. apply is_sup_seq_lub. apply H2. apply is_sup_seq_ext with (u := u). intros n. reflexivity. apply Sup_seq_ext. intros n. reflexivity. apply is_sup_seq_unique. apply H2. apply is_sup_seq_lub. apply H3.
